channel.title: CVE Feed for HP Inc. -- HP Support Assistant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP Inc. -- HP Support Assistant

item.title: CVE-2022-23453|2024-08-03T03:43:45.915Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20support%20assistant
item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified in HP Support Assistant. These vulnerabilities include privilege escalation, compromise of integrity, allowed communication with untrusted clients, and unauthorized modification of files.

item.title: CVE-2022-23454|2024-08-03T03:43:45.925Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20support%20assistant
item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified in HP Support Assistant. These vulnerabilities include privilege escalation, compromise of integrity, allowed communication with untrusted clients, and unauthorized modification of files.

item.title: CVE-2022-38395|2024-08-03T10:54:03.601Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20support%20assistant
item.description: HP Support Assistant uses HP Performance Tune-up as a diagnostic tool. HP Support Assistant uses Fusion to launch HP Performance Tune-up. It is possible for an attacker to exploit the DLL hijacking vulnerability and elevate privileges when Fusion launches the HP Performance Tune-up.

item.title: CVE-2022-23455|2024-08-03T03:43:46.108Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20support%20assistant
item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified in HP Support Assistant. These vulnerabilities include privilege escalation, compromise of integrity, allowed communication with untrusted clients, and unauthorized modification of files.
